extension.summary: Watch the latest shows from Kanal2
extension.description: This plugin allows you to see shows from www.kanal2.ee.
Selle plugina abil saate vaadata www.kanal2.ee Veebi-TVs olevaid saateid.
extension.disclaimer: Some parts of this addon may not be legal in your country of residence - please check with your local laws. Plugin is as-is, without any warranty.
Plugin on as-is ilma igasuguse garantiita.
